com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.server

Class LogsReplicationServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithName
      • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLogger
        • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponentWithLifeCycle
          • com.camerontec.util.spring.components.base.BaseComponent
            • com.camerontec.util.logsreplication.server.LogsReplicationServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasLifeCycle, IHasName, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class LogsReplicationServer
extends BaseComponent
    Entry point to the logs replication server.

    Entry into the replication server is be programmatic via the API.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LogsReplicationServer

        public LogsReplicationServer(int socketSendBufferSize,
                             int replicationServerFileReadBlockSize,
                             int replicationServerThreadPoolSize,
                             boolean replicationServerUseCompression,
                             int directoryPollPeriod,
                             String scope,
                             String JMXServiceUrl)
                      throws IOException
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        socketSendBufferSize - The socket send buffer size
        replicationServerFileReadBlockSize - The replication servers file read block size.
        replicationServerThreadPoolSize - The replication servers thread pool size.
        replicationServerUseCompression - Specifies whether or not compression should be used.
        directoryPollPeriod - The directory is polled for file changes. This specifies the directory poll period in milliseconds.
        scope - The replication server scope, must be either "LMA" for the replication server created by the LMA, or "Domain" for the replication server created by the LRS.
        JMXServiceUrl - The connection url to use to connect to the platform mbeanserver.
        Throws:
        IOException - An IOException has occurred.
